Lorolingo is a language learning app designed to help children learn vocabulary in a foreign language. The app uses children\'s natural ability to hear and distinguish the sounds of foreign languages by linking them with everyday objects.


Lorolingo was originally designed with parents bringing up a child in a foreign country in mind, but it is equally useful for bilingual parents or parents who wish to give their child a head-start in a foreign language.

What is Lorolingo?

Lorolingo is a language learning app designed to help children learn vocabulary in a foreign language. The app uses children\'s natural ability to hear and distinguish the sounds of foreign languages by linking them with everyday objects


How can my child use Lorolingo?

Lorolingo can be used in two ways:
1) By passing the device to your child, having first selected a language, and allowing them to play and choose images independently.
2) By selecting a language and interacting with your child. Ask them questions in the target language about the images that appear, and watch them learn!


Why is the app free?

Lorolingo started as a side-project of mine with the aim of improving my development skills and filling a gap that currently exists in the Android app market - that is, good quality learning resources for parents trying to teach their children a foreign language.
